page.title: 15A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content:
Our school day begins at{8.50}so I can usually manage to drag myself out of bed by 8.25.When I get to school the first thing we have to do is to {register},and then{Assembly}.Our lessons last about 35 minutes each.We have 8 lessons a day.At{11.00}we have a {break}of 15 minutes and at{12.30 another one of 75 minutes to have our lunch.We leave school at{3.50}.When I get home I do my homework.After that I either go swimming in the river Lune with my friends ,if it is hot,or to the Youth Club.I watch television after my tea.At about 10.00 I go to bed.
Victoria Robinson
